title: The Week of Mallory James: A Superhero's Legacy
summary: Mallory James, a 68-year-old tutor, discovers her ability to manipulate time during a week of tutoring, leading her to avert a disaster and change her community.
summaryGerman: Mallory James, eine 68-jährige Tutorin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, die Zeit während einer Tutoringwoche zu manipulieren, was sie dazu bringt, eine Katastrophe zu verhindern und ihre Gemeinschaft zu verändern.
summaryDutch: Mallory James, een 68-jarige tutor, ontdekt haar vermogen om tijd te manipuleren tijdens een week van tutoring, wat haar leidt tot het afwenden van een ramp en het veranderen van haar gemeenschap.
summaryFrench: Mallory James, une tutrice de 68 ans, découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps pendant une semaine de tutorat, ce qui la conduit à éviter un désastre et à changer sa communauté.

story.text: Mallory James felt a strange sensation as she explained mathematical theories to her pupil. The clock on the wall seemed to pause momentarily.
Testing her newfound powers, Mallory discovered she could rewind a few seconds back. She used it to correct a student's mistake before it discouraged him.
Mallory eagerly shared her secret with her close friend, who encouraged her to explore this gift more responsibly.
A minor earthquake hit the city. Mallory slowed down time and safely evacuated her tutoring class before anything could fall.
The news of Mallory’s heroic act spread, and she was invited to a community meeting to discuss safety protocols.
At the meeting, Mallory felt overwhelmed but used her experience as a tutor to effectively communicate her ideas, improving the town's disaster response plans.
Reflecting on her week, Mallory decided to use her powers to continue to protect and educate her community.

ending: Mallory James never expected to be a superhero, but life had its own plans.
moral: Even the most ordinary people can have extraordinary impact with the right abilities and intentions.
